simpledb

Class BPlusTreeFileIterator

  • java.lang.Object
    • simpledb.AbstractDbFileIterator
      • simpledb.BPlusTreeFileIterator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DbFileIterator

     class BPlusTreeFileIterator
extends AbstractDbFileIterator
    Helper class that implements the Java Iterator for tuples on a BPlusTreeFile

      void close()
      close the iterator
      void open()
      Open this iterator by getting an iterator on the first leaf page
      protected Tuple readNext()
      Read the next tuple either from the current page if it has more tuples or from the next page by following the right sibling pointer.

      rewind this iterator back to the beginning of the tuples
